name: Paper Arts with Drawing Techniques
description: This class is an exciting exploration in paper arts and drawing techniques using pen and ink. Colorful paper arts include, paper marbling, cyanotypes, batik wax dying, Rit dying, and gel transfers. Each art form will be paired with traditional drawing, pen and ink projects.
fullDescription: This class is an exciting exploration in paper arts and drawing techniques using pen and ink. Colorful paper arts include, paper marbling, cyanotypes, batik wax dying, Rit dying, and gel transfers. Each art form will be paired with traditional drawing, pen and ink projects.
whatTheyOffer: This class is an exciting exploration in paper arts and drawing techniques using pen and ink. Colorful paper arts include, paper marbling, cyanotypes, batik wax dying, Rit dying, and gel transfers. Each art form will be paired with traditional drawing, pen and ink projects.
howToGetIt: Register online at sfrecpark.org/register or call the registration hotline at (628) 652-2900
